title: Error syncing with mainnet on Besu 1.3.7 node - MerkleTrieException
body:
My node is raising a `MerkleTrieException` and is unable to sync to mainnet with pruning enabled.

 

Hardware specs: `Thinkpad T430 laptop, 8GB RAM 1TB SSD 4 cores i53320M 2.6GHz`

CLI arguments: `$ besu --data-path=/home/node/node --rpc-http-enabled --pruning-enabled`

 

Error log:

